overview: All bad things must come to an end... Time is short and the money's big for campus "hit man" Daulton Monroe. He's losing his old partner, training a new one, and falling in love with a bartender/lounge singer/journalist. During the biggest job of his career, the hunter becomes the hunted as someone attempts to manipulate his shadowy operation. Everyone's a suspect! No one has a clue! And the only place to hide is In Plain Sight.
title: In Plain Sight
